item.title: How Time Travel Works In Netflix's Time Cut Movie
item.description: While walking through Lucy Field's time-traveling adventures, Time Cut briefly explains the scientific ideas that make its central time machine work.

item.title: Upcoming Horror Movies Releasing In 2025
item.description: The 2025 horror movie slate features the return of more than five horror franchises, awaited adaptations, and many great original stories.

item.title: 25 Most Expensive LEGO Star Wars Minifigures Of All Time
item.description: Not all Star Wars LEGO minifigures are created equal, as some are much more exclusive and valuable than others on the secondary market from resellers.
